mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 2M-4, southwest wall
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Nelson, Jacob Paul [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A question addressed to reader. Words of encouragement with a response. A sticker with a doodle and some Arabic script. A log of activity with dates. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
The text within this image may be offensive to some.

have u heard of bofa? | it will all be ok in the end. if its not ok, its not the end. | ↓→ Sounds like some Harry Potter shit, which I happen to be a huge fan of... | log: | 10/30/14 I am here and no one else is. | 5/1/16 I am here and two people are | 2/4/18 I am here and no one else is. | 4/4/18 I am here and someone took my regular spot
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Encouragement
Harry Potter films
Doodles
